short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto close pop windows for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically close pop-ups on Facebook, Twitch, netflix or most of video websites.

-------------  Features ------------

> Recognize and automatically close pop-up ads in videos to improve your movie-viewing experience.

> Simulated manual close operation instead of blocking ads pop-ups in code level can bypass ad-blocker detection.
